highlights: Contributed to the Vehicle Optimization team, automating employee commute to the office while maximizing cab utilization.
Collaborated on automating point of interest setup for new clients, streamlining onboarding processes and enhancing client satisfaction.
Implemented a dynamic employee scheduling solution utilizing a genetic algorithm to optimize workforce allocation for clients, effectively reducing mobility costs.
Collaborated on developing a Configuration Service allowing clients to select routing algorithms for employee management.
Enhanced UI Automation Suite, elevating pass rates from 40% to 75%.
Integrated JPA and In-Memory Caching into microservices, boosting application stability by 5% and improving performance by up to 30%.

projects.name: Mailing Service
projects.description: Founded and led AWS Cloud Community-LPU during college, creating an official mailing engine and registration system to enhance communication and event coordination, leveraging AWS cloud services, and achieving measurable community growth and engagement.
